main event: An F-89 jet visually sighted a UFO on September 8, 1961, during an intercept attempt.
interesting points: The UFO was estimated to be 30-40 ft in diameter relative to the size of the F-89 jet., The object descended at high speed, hovered, and then accelerated away at an estimated speed of 1000 mph., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., There was no radar contact during the intercept., The observation was made by multiple radar operators.
location: 5 miles east of Claremont, New Hampshire, USA
witness description: Radar operators and crew members from the 511 RA SQ (SAGE), North Concord, VT
